para.heading: In general. —
para.text: There are authorized to be appropriated $ 60,000,000 for fiscal year 2012 and for each of the 4 succeeding fiscal years, of which—
one-third shall be made available to carry out the opportunity scholarship program under this division for each fiscal year;
one-third shall be made available to carry out § 38-1853.04(b)(1) for each fiscal year; and
one-third shall be made available to carry out § 38-1853.04(b)(2) for each fiscal year.

para.heading: Apportionment. —
para.text: If the total amount of funds appropriated under subsection (a) for a fiscal year does not equal $ 60,000,000, the funds shall be apportioned in the manner described in subsection (a) for such fiscal year.

annotations.annotation: This section is referenced in § 38-1853.04, § 38-1853.09, and § 38-1853.11.
For effective date of amendments made by Pub. L. 114-254, see section 162(d) of Pub. L. 114-223 as added by 101(3) of Pub. L. 114-254.

para.heading: Availability.—
para.text: Amounts appropriated under subsection (a)(1), including amounts appropriated and available under such subsection before December 10, 2016, shall remain available until expended.
